reviewText: Like that there are multiple shows all on the same dvd.
My grandson loves the DVDS, I bought it used, I wish it was cleaned before shipping

This is great for libraries and the classroom. If you need something short to follow
a read aloud story. Includes well known children's programs. Barney is 30 minutes but the other programs are about 15 minutes.

I personally thought the Barney part was a little long (ugh Barney!) but my 2 year old son didn't seem to mind.  Cute video, he watches the whole thing when it's on.  I am trying to prepare him for Halloween :)

We used to rent this DVD from our public library but it became too scratched to view.  I was happy to order it for my 3 year-old daughter who just loves it.  We mostly watch Barney (there's a very cute song about autumn) but we have watched all the others several times, also.  This is a great collection of halloween videos for children!

Both my 2-year daughter and 4-year son loved this DVD so much! I don't remember how many times they already watched. However if the part of Bob the Builder is little longer, I will give a 5-star. My kids are fans of Bob the Builder.
My kids have watched this DVD a thousand times and they still aren't sick of it.  It's absolutely adorable and a great buy at that price!
My daughter loves it... The only thing it is kind of short... But other than that it is a great DVD....
